sheet.description: Caring for eczema can be a challenge. Visit Aveeno® HCP to discover a range of soothing, moisturizing, and itch relief body & skin care products for eczema.
There's always an Aveeno® HCP product for any skin type, including sensitive skin. View all hydrating cleansers, moisturizers, and SPF at Aveeno® HCP today!
Relief your eczema symptoms with AVEENO® ECZEMA CARE hand cream. Minimize itching, redness, dryness & irritation symptoms for soothed hands. Visit AVEENO.ca
Hydrate dry skin with AVEENO® HCP ULTRA CALMING® Daily Moisturizer SPF 30. This mineral-based SPF is perfect for sensitive skin. Learn more at AVEENO.ca/hcp
AVEENO® SKIN RELIEF body wash is hypoallergenic, and works to moisturize, soothe, and gently cleanse itchy, dry, and sensitive skin. Learn more at AVEENO.ca
AVEENO® HCP SKIN RELIEF body wash is hypoallergenic, and works to moisturize, soothe, and gently cleanse itchy, dry, and sensitive skin. Visit AVEENO.ca/hcp
Protect your skin against bumps & razor burns. Made with colloidal oatmeal, enjoy a smooth shave with AVEENO® HCP SKIN RELIEF shave gel. Visit AVEENO.ca/hcp
Protect your skin against bumps & razor burns. Made with colloidal oatmeal, enjoy a smoother shave with AVEENO® SKIN RELIEF shave gel. See more at AVEENO.ca
AVEENO® Daily Moisturizing Lotion absorbs within seconds. Specially formulated with natural oat to leave skin smooth, soft, and moisturized. Visit AVEENO.ca
Made with natural colloidal oatmeal, AVEENO® BABY Eczema Care Nighttime Balm soothes your baby's dry & itchy skin. Fragrance & paraben-free. Visit AVEENO.ca
AVEENO® BABY Eczema Care Moisturizing Cream contains colloidal oatmeal to relieve itching & dryness from eczema on your baby's skin. Learn more at AVEENO.ca
Keep skin hydrated & protected with AVEENO® HCP Daily Lotion SPF 15. It contains natural colloidal oatmeal to moisturize skin for 24hrs. Visit AVEENO.ca/hcp
What is Feverfew? Learn about this plant-based ingredient and how it's used for its high antioxidant and anti-irritant benefits. Learn more at AVEENO.ca/hcp
Learn how AVEENO® formulas, sourcing & sustainable packaging commits to our goal of a healthy planet. Your skin deserves no compromise. Read on at AVEENO.ca
AVEENO® Daily Moisturizing Honey and Apricot Body Yogurt lotion contains oat to hydrate, soften, and nourish dry skin for up to 48hrs. See more at AVEENO.ca
Restore your skin's moisture barrier & soothe dry skin with AVEENO® skin relief products. For healthy-looking skin that stays smooth & soft. Visit AVEENO.ca
AVEENO® POSITIVELY RADIANT® hydrating face toner is formulated with soy extract to help rebalance your skin. Alcohol-free & oil-free. View more on AVEENO.ca
AVEENO® BABY Wash & Shampoo gently cleanses your baby's skin and hair. This formula is tear & paraben-free, & contains oat extract. Learn more at AVEENO.ca

AVEENO® Scalp Soothing Oat Milk Blend Shampoo is perfect for all hair types & daily use. Free of sulfates, parabens and dyes. Visit AVEENO.ca to learn more.
Looking to purchase an AVEENO® product? Select an online retailer to see availability or select a specific product to find a local retailer. Visit AVEENO.ca
Oat has many skin benefits such as moisturising, exfoliating & soothing dry skin. It also creates a protective barrier on your skin. Learn more at AVEENO.ca
Triple oat complex is made up on oat flour, oat extract, and oat oil. These help strengthen, hydrate, soothe, & calm dry skin. See all benefits at AVEENO.ca
Learn the benefits of colloidal oatmeal ingredient in AVEENO® products. Ideal to help soothe, protect & hydrate sensitive skin. Learn more at AVEENO.ca/hcp
